attributes.action: stop all this taxation and hideous laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: want you the government and mps of the house of commons to stop all these stupid laws and taxes ie fat tax and do what you are supposed to do and work for us, the people and not your pockets. wake up and do what the british public want!!! after all you are supposed to be working for us

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
